description.str: You don't feel very well.  On an existential level.
You don't feel very well.  On an existential level.

description: You live firmly in reality and never experience extremely vivid dreams about choices that have real world consequences.  ( You will be unable to gain Dream magicks from sleeping after strange events)

description.str: You don't feel very well.  On an existential level.

description: You feel like you've left behind your old life and form.

description.str: You don't feel very well.  On an existential level.

description: You feel like you've left behind your old life and form.
The ancient arts of drunken brawling come naturally to you!  While under the influence of alcohol, your melee skill will rise considerably, especially unarmed combat.
Who needs weapons?  You deal more melee damage while fighting barehanded and without gloves.  This damage improves as your unarmed skill increases.

//: For now life extenders such as this one grant MEND_ALL.  When the new wound system will be implemented, their function will be to always allow you to fully heal from your wounds (no scars, etc).
description: You swallow the potion and feel younger already.  Though the taste lingers long past when you'd hope it would pass.

name.str: Haunted by your dreams made flesh
Accompanied by your dreams made flesh
The Trait That Gives you Uncanny Dodge

description.str: The uncanny dodge flag now works in effects, but preserve this trait for conditional logic such as with lilin.

description:
You are a dhampir, the child of a vampire.  You have inherited a portion of their vampiric power, as well as the ability to drink blood.  Hopefully you can keep your urges under control.

As a dhampir, your blood naturally slowly fills with power over time, which you can use to fuel your abilities.
//: Dhampirs not getting Cannibal is deliberate.  The struggle over their own humanity is a core part of the dhampir theme.

description: You can use the connection of your heritage to sense nearby vampires and their minions.
activation_msg: You open your senses to the presence of the night-hunters.

descriptions.text: You sense one of the vampires' servants here.

description: You have a set of small fangs, not as long as a true vampire's, but on the other hand, you can retract them to more easily conceal them.  Activate to extend your fangs.
Your half-dead flesh is inured to winter's chill.  As long as you have empowered blood in your body, you suffer much less from colder temperatures.

The deathly energies that course through your veins are inimical to mundane poisons and diseases.  As long as you have empowered blood in your body, you are more resistant to disease, poison, and infection.
While unable to ignore gravity like a true vampire, it has less of a hold on you.  You take greatly-reduced fall damage as long as you have empowered blood in your body.
Being born closer to death, you feel the sensations of the living less strongly.  You suffer much less pain from your injuries than a human would, and the pain affects your capabilities less.

//: This should prevent permanent damage from wounds, once that's possible.
description: You are only half-alive now, sustained as much by the energy in your blood as by biological processes.  You age far slower than a mortal, and when your limbs break, they heal more quickly in proportion to how much empowered blood you have.
While you won't burn in the sunlight like a true vampire, it's not comfortable.  You suffer a -1 penalty to all stats when outdoors during the daytime, and -2 if it's sunny.
Being so close to death has slowed down the processes of your living cells considerably.  You heal at 50% of the normal rate.
Animals can sense your dead blood and they hate it.  They may run or be aggressive to you.
While running water is not deadly to you, it is uncomfortable.  Moving through running water without a boat will cause pain.
Your skin has the obviously-unnatural grayish-white tinge of a corpse, and mortals will react appropriately to seeing it.
The vampires are right about one thing; they are better than humans, and your vampire blood makes you better as well.
You have tasted blood and that taste forever lingers in the back of your mind.  You will get cravings for blood that only time or drinking more blood can sate.
The power of fresh stolen blood lingers in your veins.  The natural rate that your blood empowers itself is cut in half.
You have developed a thirst for the blood of your fellow humans.
Your eyes gleam lightly red as the light catches in them and with a few drops of the stolen blood in your veins you are able to see in the dark.
Your palate adapted to your new condition.  Drinking human blood will make you feel great.
Your stolen blood reinforces your muscles, making your grip crack bone and your punches dent steel.
Your cold flesh is not as vulnerable as it once was.  Activate to render it even more resistant to physical damage.
Your senses are heightened, allowing you to see more clearly, hear even tiny sounds, and smell nearby fresh human blood.
Your movements don't make nearby as much noise as they used to.
Your fingers have developed bloodsucking properties, you can now suck up blood through them.  You're not sure where the blood goes but with a thought you can use these deposits.
Your exhaust some of the blood in your veins to boost and recover some of your spent stamina.

name.str: Learn from the Children of the Night

description: You call out to the creatures that inhabit the night.  Wolves, bats, rats and more.  They tell you about what terrain surrounds you.

name.str: Walking the shadowed path of blood

description: You have new fangs to go along with your thirst for blood.
Your body prepares to prevent the loss of any blood to combat damage.
Your flesh heals visibly while blood disintegrates hidden inside your veins.
You can move faster than the eye can see, avoiding the claws and teeth and weapons of your enemies.
With a bit of stolen blood and a savage expression, you can send your enemies fleeing.
Gravity seems to have less of an effect than it used it.  With barely an effort you can ascend or descend even sheer walls, and you can fall any distance and land on your feet uninjured.
You can twist your fingernails into sharp claws, allowing you to inflict extra damage in unarmed combat.

description.str: Your fingers are transformed into sharp claws.  You can use them to attack, but performing mundane tasks will be harder.

description: Your vision has improved and now you can see flowing blood in the vein, like bright trails in the dark.
Blood fills you with a surge of power.  You gain a bonus to your strength and dexterity for one hour after drinking blood.

name.str: Mortal hungers are replaced with immortal hungers

description: You replace some of your regular caloric intake with blood and begin to see some of the more esoteric abilities inherent to vampirism.
You can mesmerize your prey, gazing into their eyes and freezing them in their tracks.
Your body exceeds normal human reaction limits as blood turns to ash in your veins.
Your exhaust some of the blood in your veins to recover some of your spent mana.
You are a supreme predator, and other predators bow at your feet.
You can sleep within the earth itself, avoiding the hateful light of the sun.
You have become a true vampire and are beginning to see some of the most potent abilities vampirism has to offer.
Your new status as a true vampire has empowered your other abilities.

You can enter a deathlike stake known as torpor, in which your wounds will close faster, your fatigue will fully recover and your blood thirst will be less intense.  Be careful, though, as nothing will be able to wake you up until eight hours have passed.
You can focus your gaze and take control of your target.  Only works against targets that have a mind.
You do not need to breathe air to live anymore.  It prevents you from being drowned or suffocated and allows you to ignore inhaled gases.

Your undead body is now much more dead than alive.  It prevents mundane illnesses and parasites from affecting you, while granting you a total immunity against radiation.  In addition, your scent is now something most mundane creatures cannot understand.
You can transform yourself into a bat and take wing on the night air.

description.str: You are a bat.  This provides the actual effects of bat form.  Should not be player-visible.

description: You can transform yourself into a wolf and stalk your enemies.

description.str: You are a wolf.  This provides the actual effects of wolf form.  Should not be player-visible.

description: You can transform yourself into a cloud of mist and flee any dangers.

description.str: This mutation carries the traits for mist form.  You shouldn't be able to see it in-game.

description: By reaching the final stage of vampirism, you have freed yourself from your mundane needs.  The only sustenance you need now is blood.
//: When weariness can be modified through Json, this mutation should make the player immune to it.

description: Your ability to influence others has amplified.  You can now spend blood while talking with someone else to make them like you more, with the costliest application of this power being able to turn them into your obsessed servants.  Not all can be influenced by this power, for anger, panic and strong ties to a group that isn't yours will disrupt the process.  Other vampires and the rare saint-blooded are also immune to it.

Unlike lesser vampires who bloat as they gorge on blood, you concentrate the blood you consume, making it fit nicely in your veins.  This removes the penalties for containing too much blood, but doesn't expand your maximal capacity.

You can shroud your body and what you are carrying with shadows, amplifying your combat ability but preventing communication and using other powers until you return to your normal form.  It also costs blood for every second you spend in that state.

description.str: You are shrouded in shadows.  This provides the actual effects of Shadow form.  Should not be player-visible.

description: Your mastery over your mist form has increased to the point that you can now instinctively activate it should you be about to die.  It requires you to have a lot of stolen blood in your body and can't trigger more than once a week but might save your life.
Your vampiric potency has reinforced your mind beyond anything a mortal could ever hope.  You are immune to anything that could negatively impact your mind.
//: There is no difference between this and the Ierde version, so I use that one instead of making a new one to avoid duplicates.  The player isn't supposed to see this anyway.

description: You mastery over the shadowed path of blood has become much more potent, allowing you to use your vampiric powers and a massive expense of blood to blot out the sun for a few dozen minutes.
This person is now a renfield, a human obsessed with serving their vampire masters.  This obsession impedes their cognition as they struggle to think about anything but serving said vampire masters.

description.str: Intended to be hidden.  Prevent the mentor from being killed by vampires and renfields.

description: You thirst for blood is more intense than usual.  You now need twice as much blood to prevent blood starvation.
Your body brings to mind a rotting corpse.  Social interactions will be much harder for you.
//: You have to convince those you talk to that you're not just a smarter zombie, hence the intimidate malus.

description: You now depend on the proximity to the earth to sleep well.  Should you sleep or torpor aboveground or not surrounded by earth, you will suffer penalties for the next day.

name.str: Vampiric weakness: rebuked by holy ground

description: Your flesh will burn should you ever enter a sanctified area.  Only places that are holy will burn you, so holy places filled with vampires or unholy humans are safe for you to enter.
//: Unsafe: churches, cathedrals, synagogues, rural churches, eventual other holy places.
//2: Safe: Vampire-filled holy places, the New England Community Church, anywhere not unsafe.

name.str: Vampiric weakness: melted by vast water

description: Your flesh will melt should you ever try to cross a large body of water or get too close to them.  Only rivers, lakes and oceans have enough water to trigger this weakness, but it will take effect even if floating or water-walking.
Animals cannot tolerate your wicked presence.  Expect any animal you encounter to either flee or attack you on sight.
Fire damages you far more than it should.  You take massive damage from fire and flames, mundane and magical.

name.str: Vampiric weakness: cold as a corpse

description: You now lack amy body heat.  You feel colder at all times, and being cold will slow you down.

You now need to drink some fresh, warm blood from a living being once in a while or suffer growing penalties.  You better find someone willing to share their blood, as blood from fresh corpses won't satisfy this need.
Your ability to process varied types of blood is now hampered.  Blood that isn't regular human blood will only sate your thirst half as much.
Your thirst for blood will occasionally magnify, causing painful cravings.  You can calm these cravings as or before they happen by consuming blood.

//: Required for vampire blood to have any consumption benefit.  Regular vampires instinctively feel threatened by you and their renfields try to protect them, so they react accordingly.
//2: The traits unlocked by this have no category, as they aren't given by the regular mutation system.
description: Through the consumption of self-cannibalizing vampire blood, you gained the ability to consume vampire blood to gain vampiric abilities undreamt of by other vampires.
Your vestigial circulatory system is now better at holding stolen blood.  You can hold five more liters inside you.
Your ability to see in the dark has expanded.  You no longer need to spend blood to maintain your gleaming eyes.
You can now attract the blood within a corpse's veins, extracting it all in a second through a small cut.  In addition, you can create temporary blood containers by spending mana.
In comparison to you, regular vampires are the same as mortals.  You can now detect nearby vampires, your new prey, even through walls.

Your digestive system has warped to repurpose some vestigial parts, making you much better at drinking blood.  Drinking reasonable amounts of blood won't ever stretch your stomach, and you drink blood much faster now.
Your supernatural senses have expanded.  You can now see anything close to some nocturnal creatures, even if they lack sight.

//: The main draw of BLOOD_FUN is fae blood being a net morale positive.  The main draw of this upgrade is getting stat boosts from the high morale.
description: Becoming more vampire than vampires are has affected your new palate, making the consumption of blood feel even better than before.  You now enjoy drinking blood so much that enough of it will bolster your resolve for a while.
Your lack of movement noise is now encompassing any noise you could do in combat.  All such noises you would've made by attacking in melee are nullified.

//: Behaves as the anathema's threshold, letting the EOC give the stronger traits.  The enabler is a threshold to limit mixing regular mutations and this path.
//2: A few mentors knew that this was possible, but they kept the secret to not threaten the plan.
description: You drank enough vampire blood to gain access to power the mentors never thought possible.  There is no more limit to how powerful of a vampire you can be.
Your new power allows you to store even more stolen blood inside your body.  You can hold another ten liters inside you.

//: should only work in the dark, but such checks aren't yet.
description: Darkness is your home, and you can call it to shroud you from others.  When away from the sun, you can become invisible with a constant expense of blood.
//2: This enchantment removes the effect if the vampire is outside at day.

//: should only work in the dark, but such checks aren't yet.
description: Darkness is your new friend, and like a good friend it helps you through hard times.  Passively heal your wounds and reduce your pain while away from the sun.

The powers of vampires come through their sustenance of blood, and you now know how to use this at your advantage.  You can increase your need for blood to boost your vampiric potency until you decide to stop the effect.  If you do not have enough blood, it will have no effect until you drink more blood.
activation_msg: Your power increases as your blood burns away.

description: Increases blood potency and drain while the player-visible version is active and has enough blood.  You should never see this.

Being protected against mundane afflictions only is something your flesh has stopped tolerating.  Your condition now protects you from any illness, parasite and poison, no matter how dangerous they are.
You are much more attuned to your other forms, and they are now easier to activate than ever.  The cost to activate them is halved.
Your instinctive mastery of your mist form has expanded.  You now recover from triggering Last Breath's Mist twice as quickly.
Vampires, mortals, they are all the same for you now.  Drinking vampire blood now gives all the benefits of drinking regular blood, in addition to growing your power.
Your own blood now reveals its secrets to you.  Every week, you will gain a new gift of the blood.  It will only give you what researching your blood gifts could give you.

name.str: Maximal Mastery of the Mortal Mind

description: Your mind-control abilities are much simpler to use now, halving their cost.

name.str: Anathema's Weakness: Slain by the Sun

description: Vampires burn under the sun, and becoming more of a vampire made you burn far more than any other vampire would.  While under the sun, you will take constant damage no matter how covered you are.

Your constant consumption of vampire blood has permanently destabilized your mind, and it will only grow worse with each new vampire drained.  Each time you drink vampire blood, you have a growing chance to gain a new mental affliction.

Drinking all this vampire blood has left your body yearning for more.  Going too long without drinking vampire blood will progressively increase your thirst for blood with each passing day until you starve or drink vampire blood.

Through a complicated ritual utilizing a saint's relic, you have transubstantiated your own blood with the holy blood of the saints.  It'll prevent you from becoming infected with vampirism while you live, effects postmortem unknown.
You aren't where you seem to be.
You are no longer limited to the five senses common to most humans in your hunt for the unnatural.
Boann bestowed upon you the right to summon a few daffodil warriors once a day.
You were born with an allergy to iron and, to a lesser extent, steel.  Wearing or touching anything made of iron or steel will cause you pain and discomfort.
The Fair Folk can sense the stolen power within you and their vengeance will be terrible.
The arvore can sense the stolen power within you and they will not react well to it.
The homullus can sense the stolen power within you and they will not react well to it.
The salamanders can sense the stolen power within you and they will not react well to it.

description.str: Intended to be hidden.  Makes Boann teleport the player away, spawns some huntsmen and hounds then cure all her ailments and injuries if she survives being hit by the player.
